actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States for the protection of unborn children and other persons.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Applies the fifth and fourteenth articles of amendment of the United States Constitution to unborn children at every stage of development. Forbids abortions except in those cases specified in this Act. Gives Congress and States the power to enforce this article by appropriate legislation.

titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States for the protection of unborn children and other persons.
